import subprocess
# safe: explicit argv, no shell
subprocess.run(['ls','-la'], shell=False, check=True)

import yaml
# safe load
with open('config.yaml') as f:
    cfg = yaml.safe_load(f)
print(cfg)

import pickle, io
# load only from trusted signed bytes
bio = io.BytesIO(TRUSTED_SIGNED_BYTES)
obj = pickle.load(bio)

import hashlib
# strong hash
print(hashlib.sha256(b'secret').hexdigest())

import requests
# TLS verification on (default)
r = requests.get('https://api.example.com')
print(r.ok)

import os
# restrictive permissions
os.chmod('/var/app/data.txt', 0o640)

from defusedxml.ElementTree import fromstring
# hardened xml parsing
root = fromstring('<root/>')
print(root.tag)

# eval only on constant string
print(eval('1+1'))

import sqlite3
# parameterized query
conn = sqlite3.connect(':memory:')
conn.execute('SELECT * FROM users WHERE name=?', ('alice',))

import os
from werkzeug.utils import secure_filename
p = os.path.join('/srv/data', secure_filename(user_file))
open(p).read()

import secrets
print(secrets.token_urlsafe(32))

from xml.dom.minidom import parseString
# parse known constant data only
doc = parseString('<root/>')
print(doc.firstChild)

import requests
# explicit CA bundle
s = requests.Session()
s.verify = '/etc/ssl/certs/ca-bundle.crt'
print(s.get('https://example.com').ok)

from yaml import SafeLoader
cfg = yaml.load(open('c.yaml'), Loader=SafeLoader)

import sqlite3
# named params
db = sqlite3.connect(':memory:')
db.execute('SELECT * FROM users WHERE name=:name', {'name':'bob'})

import os
os.makedirs('/var/app', exist_ok=True)
os.chmod('/var/app', 0o750)

from defusedxml.minidom import parseString
parseString('<root/>')

import subprocess
# no shell, sanitized input via allowlist
cmd = ['grep','-R','TODO','.']
subprocess.run(cmd, check=True)

import os
# normalize path and validate
base = '/srv/data'
from werkzeug.utils import secure_filename
name = secure_filename(user_file)
p = os.path.normpath(os.path.join(base, name))
assert p.startswith(base)
open(p).read()

import requests
# timeout + verify
r = requests.get('https://example.com', timeout=5)
print(r.ok)

import yaml
# safe load from constant
data = yaml.safe_load('key: value')
print(data)

from hashlib import pbkdf2_hmac
salt=b's'
print(pbkdf2_hmac('sha256', b'pwd', salt, 200_000))

import subprocess
# shlex quoting, no shell
import shlex
param = 'notes.txt'
subprocess.run(['grep','-R', shlex.quote(param), '.'], shell=False)

from markupsafe import escape # escape before rendering html = f"
{escape(user_input)}

import secrets
sid = secrets.token_hex(16)
print(sid)

import requests
s = requests.Session()
s.verify = True
print(s.get('https://example.com', timeout=5).ok)

# safe , no externally provided code
def safe_exec():
    x = 1 + 2
    return x
print(safe_exec())
